Hmm how do I install nomachine nx?
you need 3 packages (in this order): nxclient, nxnode, nxserver
download the debs into their own directory, dpkg -i nx*.deb , then apt-get install -f
the server wont install without the client
and you will need the client only on remote machines
it should start after its installed
